unnormalised: Boream re, ami ankdeam vixim uloium! khas korun, Infosys-achea xevottachea arthik ahevalaachem vishlexonn korum-ia. tea sogllea corporet jabdogonak visrun vochum, ami tem khorem dovortole ani te ankdeacho amchea desinchea lokank khoincho orth asa to polloum-ia.
normalised: Barabor mhunnche bhau, amkam ankdeancher uloiam! khas korun, I-N-F-O-S-Y-S hacho nimanno arthik riport-acho bhag kortelim. ti corporate jargon visarun voch, ami tankam asli dekhun ravon tankam desis khatir ti ankdeanchi asli arth kitem asa tem polletelim.

unnormalised: poileach suvater, rajasvo ₹37,335 croran ailo. atam, tem ek bhari rakkam! tem Ambanik rastear ₹500 not melltta mhonncheam sarkhem - torui fer poddtta, sori? mazak visrun, tem ek vhodd ankddo, punn vorsachea vorsachea uddegeachi vikas ghevn jeatxe te poddhotechi axa asa tech porim nam. ami sumarat 11% (YoY) vixim uloitat.
normalised: Poilem, revenue rupia teesttis hazar teenso teesttis crore-ak vhelo. Aata, ti ek dam zasti rakhmo! hem Ambani-k rasteacher rupia panchso note melltta mhunnchea sarkhem asa – tannak astana fark zata, vo? Vinod soddun, ti ek vhodd ankdo, punn vorsachi vadd vorsak kiteakui ashi daddak nastana zai asli. Ami vorsak vorsak sumar ekra percentacher uloitat.

unnormalised: magir kara uprantcho labh (PAT) asa, zo ₹6,021 cror ailo. vaitt na, vaitt na khaxa. te pojekttakhatir unno asa. tumchea chachan tumkam bore gunn mellounk ₹5000 divpachem utor dilem, punn tumkam fokot ₹3000 dilem tem gupit na? tech porim, apekxa puri zali na.
normalised: Uprant tax uprant profit asa, jem rupia so hazar ani ekvees crore-ak aaila. vaitt na, vaitt kiteakunui na. tem prokalpit keli asleapon chodd unnem asa. tumchea chachan tumkam rupia panch hazar bore marks-ak divchem mhunn vachan dilem, punn tankam rupia teen hazar divnkhui tumi odlolem? te sarkhem, asha thodi porimann mellli na.

unnormalised: atam, oparetting margins - hantunt vostu bore dixtti poddtat. te 21.5% asa. tem probhavit disunk xakta, punn tem poilea quartieraposun thoddem unnem asa. TCS sarke compenio-i khelant asat. tumchea moholleantlea Gillie Danda spordhent jinkunk protinidhitv korchem kalpan karun gheiat zai Sharmajichem bhurgem-i proffexnol asa - tea pattli prottispordha zaka te bhagekarank bhettounk poddtta.
normalised: aata, operating margins - hanga vostu rasbhorit zata. tanchem twenty one point five percentacher bosun asa. tem impress korchea sarkeak dhyanant dhyan divchea sarkeak tumkam dista, punn te nimanne quarter-chea compare-er thodde khala ailea. T-C-S sarkhea company-o khunui gamachea bhitar asa. Sharmaji-chea ballak khunui ek pro asa tedna tumi tumchea mohallant Gilli Danda competition jinkhunk prayatn korop kalpum - ti kitli competition asa hi lokan fass karun asa.

unnormalised: aheval banking ani arthik seva kxetrantlea mahatvachea jinkhnnanchea vixiaxii dekhavo dito. tachem chintun gheiat zai 5 million dollarakhatir ek vhodd pojektt mellovn. tem CV-cher borem disunk vetolem ani campenichea lamb kaalla khatir borem asa.
normalised: report-an banking ani financial services sector-achea bhitar kainchuch mukhil jinkhache muke keli. dollar panch million-achea mollachi ek vhodd project mellona mhunn kalpum. tem C-V-cher borem dista ani company-chea lamb kaalache bhageponn-ak vaddoita.

unnormalised: tumcheam sogllea investtarankhatir, hi chaha: Infosys pudentlea fikal vorsankhatir 13% te 16% rajasvachi vikas bhorvonk xaktta. atam, tem bhavixyachem udhdheaxachem bhasann, khatrechi vostu nhoi. tem thoddem nimok ghevn gheiat.
normalised: tumi soglle investora khatir bhitorli baat asa: I-N-F-O-S-Y-S nimnnem financial year-a khatir revenue growth tera percent ani soll percent bhitorachi batayta. aata, ti prediction asa, guarantee na. tankam namak-achi ek chimut ghe.

unnormalised: thoddem vegllaich nodret, nokri soddun vochpachem vichar ek chintanchi vostu asa. tem 25.2% sumarak asa. tachem arth mhonnllear khup lok vochot asat. tem tumche cricket teamachea orddha lokanim sector 15 mukabla korcho asa ani tumkam to soddun vochpa sarkhem asa! tem pojekttakhatir ani dedlainakhatir vaitt zata.
normalised: thodya vegllya note-acher, employee attrition ek chinta asa. tem teesttis point don percentacher ghumta. tacho arth ki khup lok bhair sortat. sector fifteena-chea virudh final match-a adhi tumchi ardh cricket team tumkam soddun diunk nirnnay ghe mhunnchia sarkhem asa! projects ani deadlines khatir ek asli dukhi davo zata.

unnormalised: sodankal, arthik aheval ek campeniachi chitra sangta ti vaddoitat, punn tankam vhaddacho vattankhatir voddponn bhettounk poddtta. tem udhdheogachea vixex zageacher paulear asonn torui tem vhodd vaittui nam. ek borem, thoran korpi prastavit bazaratlean vatt kaddtta. tumchea sadharan Bharotiea kakachea sarkheam zannank ek dhondo chalaunk poddtta. udheog dhir dhorun cholta, te khoreponna khatir.
normalised: overall, financial report ek company-cho chitrar rup dita ji astana vaddonk, punn kainchuch probhavichea virudh. ti ek bhageli jay zata ti batay na, punn ti khedanui na. ek bori, majboot performer ek mushkil market-ak cholounk zata. tumcho average Indian uncle ek lhan business cholounk prayatn korta to sarkho. Tankam astana majboot ravon, tankam asli dekhun ravon.
